name: Viking RPG (Slendir)
description:
Viking RPG is an adventure game with a great storyline. We are a Viking who with a group of friends went to conquer village.Unfortunately, they win. Vikings lost. The main character disguises himself as knight and got caught. The sorceress is runned out. Last friend is the witch and she works in the enemy village. During the game, we have a fantastic adventure with the RPG elements, but how end this story ?

Visit also Greenlight : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=725028891
